name: Pandemonium (Zeldariomon)
description:
A chaotic game with idle clicking elements added with various power-ups to enhance the gameplay of the player. Here the covid disease is spreading from person to person and you need to control the epidemic by using various safety measures in the forms of powerups like masks, vaccines, sanitizers etc. 

You can also quarantine people to cure them. However, you need more people to maintain the money income. How long can you control the pandemic?

Controls

Since it is an android based game, hence you can tap the screen for various things
